articles.content:

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo shows up for debut with bruise under his eye after being punched - The Mirror
articles.description: The 37-year-old at long last played in a competitive game for new side Al-Nassr but did so while boasting what looked like a painful black eye after being punched by Keylor Navas
articles.content: Cristiano Ronaldo finally made his debut for Saudi Arabian outfit Al-Nassr, but did so while sporting a rather painful looking bruise under his eye after being punched during last week's friendly aga… [+2600 chars]
